15 -def getID(var_type): 

16      if var_type == "float": 
17          return 1 
18      elif var_type == "int" or var_type == "integer": 
19          return 2 
20      elif var_type == "string" or var_type == "str": 
21          return 3 
22      else: 
23          return -1

25 -def getType(ID): 

26      if ID == 1: 
27          return "float" 
28      elif ID == 2: 
29          return "integer" 
30      elif ID == 3: 
31          return "string" 
32      else: 
33          return "undefined type"
